commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Unbelievable! Another penalty on Edmonton! This time it's Ceci for high-sticking Tkachuk. The Panthers are going to be on the power play... again!

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: This is getting out of hand. Edmonton simply cannot keep taking penalties like this. They're playing with fire, and Florida's power play is ready to make them pay.
